title: Animation-Based Project Learning for Strengthening Pharmaceutical Practice Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Current pharmaceutical professionals conduct project-based and formative assessment-centered learning using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Analyze at least three 3D animated videos explaining formulation design processes and diagram key manufacturing stages
Produce animated PBL team solutions for actual pharmaceutical process problems and derive over 80% improved proposals through peer evaluation
Identify five key variables (e.g., compression force, flow rate) in tablet manufacturing processes with 90% accuracy in formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
